title: PK22 Tan
body: Style PK22 chair originally designed by Kjaerholm in 1953, winner of the Milan Triennale in 1957. Manufactured from high quality formed thick brushed stainless steel and available in a number of different thick leather colours, elegant as a singles piece, dominant and commanding as a pair. Beautifully matched with any of our Poul Kaerholm Coffee Table.
